amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for various programs under the Department of Veterans Affairs by $53 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for BRAC 2005 by $169,000,000 and to increase the funding for Veterans' Affairs by $53,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Melancon amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 214 (Roll no. 224).
